name: RoadTrip
0:
”Alexa, open road trip”
”Alexa, start road trip”
”Alexa, launch road trip”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: road trip
des:
This skill helps you pick your next vacation spot by asking you a series of preference questions and then finding the closest place to your departure town.
This skill will ask you four vacation preference questions and your origination location and suggest a vacation spot within the continental USA.

This skill is based on Caroline Dunn's travels through 43 states and 42 countries.
Caroline's website: http://carolinedunn.org/
Alexa Dev Group: http://www.alexadevgroup.com/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolinedunn/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thecarolinedunn
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
